title: 【服主福利】crackshot 插件成品分享，绝对原创
author: 苏泽吧
txt_content:
本帖最后由 苏泽吧 于 2017-3-18 21:54 编辑 
简介 Description大家好，为了给各大服主等提供便利(福利)。我把自己原创的crackshot插件的配置分享给大家

喷火器PHQ:
    Item_Information:

        Item_Name: "&9(死亡不掉落)&3喷火器"

        Item_Type: 377

        Item_Lore: "&3武器类型：&a喷火器|&3子弹类型：&a无需子弹|&3枪械等级：&a4s|&3后坐力：&a无|&3威力：&a★★|&3射程：&a中|&3装弹时间：&a5s|&3精准度：&a范围伤害|&c持续灼伤"

        Sounds_Acquired: BLOCK_FIRE_AMBIENT

    Shooting:

        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true

        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true

        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true

        Projectile_Amount: 1

        Projectile_Type: energy

        Projectile_Subtype: 9-6-NONE-1

        Projectile_Damage: 2

        Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_SHOOT-1-2-0

        Delay_Between_Shots: 4

        Projectile_Incendiary:

            Enable: true

            Duration: 40

    Reload:

        Enable: true

        Reload_Amount: 20

        Reload_Duration: 100

        Sounds_Reloading: IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-2-0

    Particles:

        Enable: true

        Particle_Player_Shoot: flames-1

    Abilities:

        Death_No_Drop: true

    Custom_Death_Message:

        Normal: "&8战区情报》》<shooter>使用 &9(死亡不掉落)&3喷火器&8 把<victim>击毙"




高压水枪water:    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&9(死亡不掉落)&3高压水枪"
        Item_Type: 409
        Item_Lore: "&3武器类型：&a冲锋枪|&3子弹类型：&a冲锋枪子弹|&3枪械等级：&a4s|&3后坐力：&a无|&3威力：&a★★★|&3射程：&a中上|&3装弹时间：&a4s|&3精准度：&a高|&3潜行后无后坐力"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 2
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 5
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Speed: 30
        Projectile_Damage: 5
        Bullet_Spread: 0.75
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
    Ammo:
        Enable: true
        Ammo_Item_ID: 318
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Shoot_With_No_Ammo: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 30
        Reload_Duration: 80
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-2
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: block_break-9
    Custom_Death_Message:
        Normal: "&8战区情报》》<shooter>使用 &9(死亡不掉落)&3高压水枪&8 把<victim>击毙"




防爆盾FBD:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&d防爆盾"
        Item_Type: 283
        Item_Lore: "&8可防御子弹，近身攻击|&8直面50%全方位格挡|&8可防御33次伤害"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Riot_Shield:
        Enable: true
        Durability_Loss_Per_Hit: 1
        Sounds_Blocked: GLASS-2-2-0
        Sounds_Break: ITEM_BREAK-2-1-0



粒子光束枪LZ:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&9(死亡不掉落)&3粒子光束枪"
        Item_Type: 369
        Item_Lore: "&3武器类型：&a粒子光束|&3子弹类型：&a无需子弹|&33枪械等级：&a4s|&3后坐力：&a无|&3威力：&a★★★★|&3射程：&a中|&3装弹时间：&a中|&3精准度：&a高"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Subtype: 14-3-NONE-2
        Projectile_Damage: 7
        Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_SHOOT-1-2-0,EXPLODE-1-2-0
        Delay_Between_Shots: 20
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 8
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: true
        Reload_Duration: 30
        Sounds_Reloading: IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-2-0
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: BLOCK_BREAK-57
    Abilities:
        Death_No_Drop: true
    Custom_Death_Message:
        Normal: "&8战区情报》》<shooter>使用 &9(死亡不掉落)&3粒子光束枪&8 把<victim>击毙"




还有好多没发 看评分人数再继续发吧给人气是不会扣自己的，不妨花0.1s给楼主个人气吧

replies.author: yuen27787231
replies.txt_content: 謝謝分享 看來遲點整個cso的武器都能造出來
